commands.name: az confidentialledger create
commands.summary: Creates a  Confidential Ledger with the specified ledger parameters.
examples: az confidentialledger create --location "EastUS" --aad-based-security-principals ledger-role-name="Administrator" principal-id="34621747-6fc8-4771-a2eb-72f31c461f2e" tenant-id="bce123b9-2b7b-4975-8360-5ca0b9b1cd08" --cert-based-security-principals cert="-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----------END CERTIFICATE-----" ledger-role-name="Reader" --ledger-type "Public" --tags additionalProps1="additional properties" --name "DummyLedgerName" --resource-group "DummyResourceGroupName"

commands.name: az confidentialledger list
commands.summary: Retrieves the properties of all Confidential Ledgers. And Retrieves the properties of all Confidential Ledgers.

commands.name: az confidentialledger show
commands.summary: Retrieves the properties of a Confidential Ledger.

commands.name: az confidentialledger update
examples: az confidentialledger update --location "EastUS" --aad-based-security-principals ledger-role-name="Administrator" principal-id="34621747-6fc8-4771-a2eb-72f31c461f2e" tenant-id="bce123b9-2b7b-4975-8360-5ca0b9b1cd08" --cert-based-security-principals cert="-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----" ledger-role-name="Reader" --ledger-type "Public" --tags additionProps2="additional property value" additionalProps1="additional properties" --name "DummyLedgerName" --resource-group "DummyResourceGroupName"

commands.name: az confidentialledger wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of the confidentialledger is met.
